description: Manage Azure NetApp Files (ANF) BackupVault Resources.

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault create
commands.summary: Create the specified Backup Vault in the NetApp account.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault create --account-name
                                           --backup-vault-name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--location]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--tags]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault create
commands.summary: Create the specified Backup Vault in the NetApp account.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault create --account-name
                                           --backup-vault-name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--location]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--tags]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault delete
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault delete [--account-name]
                                           [--backup-vault-name]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--yes]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault delete
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault delete [--account-name]
                                           [--backup-vault-name]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--yes]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault list
commands.summary: List and describe all Backup Vaults in the NetApp account.

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault list
commands.summary: List and describe all Backup Vaults in the NetApp account.

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault update
commands.summary: Update the specified Backup Vault in the NetApp account.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault update [--account-name]
                                           [--add]
                                           [--backup-vault-name]
                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--remove]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--set]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--tags]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault update
commands.summary: Update the specified Backup Vault in the NetApp account.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles account backup-vault update [--account-name]
                                           [--add]
                                           [--backup-vault-name]
                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--remove]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--set]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--tags]

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.

commands.name: az netappfiles account backup-vault wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
